title: Should I pay 27000 to get pixel 3a repaired by B2X?
content:
My google pixel 3a stopped working all of a sudden. It did not power on.
I sent the phone to B2X to get it repaired. Since the phone was under warranty and there was no fault of mine that the phone stopped working, I was expecting it to be repaired free of cost. Yesterday (after 20 days from service request) I got an email from B2X that I need to pay ₹27000 to get my phone repaired. I had brought the phone for ₹28000. How can they quote so much? Are they trying to con me??
Do you know if there's some means to contest/escalate this?
